summary: The video features Vice President Kamala Harris delivering her first political remarks after President Joe Biden announced he would not seek reelection and endorsed her for the presidency. Harris addresses campaign staff at the Delaware headquarters, emphasizing her commitment to earning the Democratic nomination and winning the presidency. President Biden makes a surprise call-in to thank the staff, stating he is not retiring and will continue to work on legislation and campaign alongside Harris. Harris outlines her campaign goals, focusing on protecting democracy, combating Trump's influence, and addressing issues like affordable healthcare, fair wages, and reproductive rights. She highlights her history as a prosecutor and her vision for a future where everyone has opportunities to succeed, emphasizing the importance of building the middle class and ensuring equal rights.
keywords: Vice President Kamala Harris, President Joe Biden, Democratic nomination, presidential campaign, Delaware headquarters, campaign staff, political remarks, election, Trump, reproductive rights, affordable healthcare, fair wages, middle class, building opportunities, protecting democracy
